attributes.name: Studio Recording
attributes.description: When recording at our studio in Santa Cruz, our first priority is always your artistic expression. We’ll handle the technical stuff, so you can focus on what you do best. Need your recordings mixed or mastered after the session? We’ll offer you a 20% discount on our mixing & mastering services (valid for all Ikaika Records studio recordings).
attributes.metadescription: Studio recording services, in person at $30/hr.

attributes.name: Sound Mixing and Mastering
attributes.description: We understand the frustration of recording the perfect song, only for the mix to sound like it’s been run through a garbage disposal. When collaborating with us to mix and master your tracks, you'll take advantage of our digitally equalized room, 2.2 stereo monitoring environment, and years of music experience. Let’s take your mix from garbage disposal to award winning.
attributes.metadescription: Sound mixing and mastering services, in person or remote at $50/hr.

attributes.name: Manual Quantization
attributes.description: Manually quantizing audio is said to greatly decrease your lifespan. We’ll shoulder those migraines and get your audio synced up.
attributes.metadescription: Manual quantization services, in person or remote at 85$/hr.
